title: Audit & Fix: Complete Event Coverage for Real-time Updates

context.businessContext: Complete real-time synchronization is critical for user experience. Missing events mean users won't see updates for certain operations, creating confusion about what succeeded vs failed.
context.technicalContext: The storage subscription mechanism is working for create/update events, but we need to audit all operations in WorkspaceDevlogManager to ensure comprehensive event coverage. This includes CRUD operations, state changes, batch operations, and metadata updates.
acceptanceCriteria: All CRUD operations emit proper events
SSE Bridge handles all event types
No missing real-time updates for any operation
